original: Nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanaṁ
analyzed: na sa nidassanam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassanaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na anidassanaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sanidassanam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasanidassano ca naanidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paṭicca na anidassano ca na anidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi
